remarks: Value of the directed integral in the backward direction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
statement:
ditgpos.1 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
ditgneg.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ditgneg.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ditgneg $p |- ( ph -> S_ [ B -> A ] C _d x = -u S. ( A (,) B ) C _d x ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ph x $.
